sqlMap.procedure:
DECLARE I_COUNT NUMBER; I_SEQ VARCHAR2(10) := #seq#; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(SEQ) INTO I_COUNT FROM I_BOARD_RECORD WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; BEGIN IF I_COUNT <> 0 THEN UPDATE I_BOARD_RECORD SET CATEGORY_SEQ = #categorySeq#,
NOTICE_YN = #noticeYn#,
TITLE = #title#, URL = #url#, CONTENTS = #contents#,
SECRET_YN = #secretYn#,
PASSWORD = #password#,
MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = #modId#, MOD_IP = #modIp# WHERE SEQ = I_SEQ; ELSE INSERT INTO I_BOARD_RECORD ( CONFIG_SEQ, CATEGORY_SEQ, SEQ, NOTICE_YN, TITLE, URL, CONTENTS, SECRET_YN, PASSWORD, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_IP, GROUP_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, DEPTH ) VALUES( #configSeq#, #categorySeq#, I_SEQ, #noticeYn#, #title#, #url#, #contents#, #secretYn#, #password#, #regId#, #regName#, #regIp#, #groupSeq#, #parentSeq#, #depth# ); END IF; END; END;
